category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 31 (Regional Coexistence Committee)
contents: Article 31 (Regional Coexistence Committee) The regional coexistence committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the direction of promotion for mutual development of institutions and regions 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and promotion of plans for mutual cooperation between institutions and regions 3. Matters pertaining to social contribution activities and the discovery and dissemination of best practices, etc. 4. Other matters pertaining to mutual growth with the region Matters that are recognized as being in compliance with the committee's functions and submitted by the chairman [This article was newly established on July 5, 2023]
